players.name: Bob
memory: You: "I find it strange that Alice was found dead on the first night. Let's keep a close eye on each other to ensure we don't lose any more town members."
Diana: "I agree with Bob's sentiment about keeping an eye on each other. Let's work together to uncover any suspicious activity and ensure the safety of our town."

You: "I'm concerned about the sudden turn of events in our town. Alice's death is troubling, and we need to work together to ensure that the killer doesn't strike again. Let's all be open and honest with each other during discussions to help..."

Diana: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we have to help us uncover the truth behind Alice's death. I don't have any concrete evidence at the moment, but I will keep a close eye on any suspicious activity and report back to..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
